title: NO more KeyFragment
body: Riot i would like to ask that why i cant even get a key fragment although i played for like 2 week time . Is it a bug  or what ?

replies.body: The drop rate for key fragments decrease the more you receive them, and resets roughly every 30 days.  You will find yourself finding many fragments at first and then slowly go down.  Details on how the drop rate works are also available in our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  Once the reset occurs you will find them at a faster rate!
